item.title: 贡渥集团新任首席执行官称利润已从上半年的低谷中回升
item.description: 贡渥集团（Gunvor Group —）是一家能源商，周一宣布了一项员工收购计划—；贡渥集团的新掌门人表示，由于更好的贸易机会和强劲的炼油利润率，收益已经从上半年的低迷中反弹。【原文：The new head of Gunvor Group — the energy merchant which announced a staff buyout on Monday — said earnings have rebounded from a poor first half amid better trading opportunities and strong oil-refining margins.】

item.title: 埃里克-施密特和泽维尔-尼尔支持法国人工智能语音初创公司 Gradium
item.description: 一家名为 Gradium 的巴黎人工智能语音初创公司已经从一个非营利性研究实验室中分离出来，并从一批知名投资者那里筹集到了 7000 万美元的资金，其中包括前谷歌首席执行官埃里克-施密特（Eric Schmidt）和法国电信亿万富翁泽维尔-尼尔（Xavier Niel）。【原文：A Paris-based artificial intelligence voice startup called Gradium has spun out of a nonprofit research lab and raised $70 million in funding from a group of A-list investors, including former Google Chief Executive Officer Eric Schmidt and French telecom billionaire Xavier Niel.】

item.title: 战略给交易者上了一堂杠杆与波动的课
item.description:
迈克尔-赛勒对比特币的押注出了差错，杠杆 ETF 的持有者受到了惩罚

Michael Saylor’s bet on Bitcoin has gone awry, punishing holders of leveraged ETFs

】

item.title: 亿万富翁汤姆-斯泰尔避开私人信贷炒作，瞄准利基交易
item.description: 汤姆-斯太尔（Tom Steyer）资产管理公司的信贷部门正瞄准私人交易中的一个细分市场，该市场的发展轨迹与其他市场不同。【原文：The credit arm of Tom Steyer’s asset management firm is targeting a niche corner of private dealmaking that’s been on a different trajectory to the rest of the market.】

item.title: 国际清算银行（BIS）发现：最大的对冲基金正在利用超低的杠杆率
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）称，由于与交易商关系密切，全球最大的对冲基金正在债券市场上以极低的成本积累比小型对手 "高得多 "的杠杆。【原文：The world’s largest hedge funds are accumulating “substantially higher” leverage in the bond market than smaller rivals at very low cost thanks to their close relationships with dealers, according to the Bank for International Settlements.】

item.title: 南非铁路 120 年垄断结束，Traxtion 机队扩充一倍
item.description: 南非私营货运铁路运营商 Traxtion 将投资 34 亿兰特（约合 1.99 亿美元）购买机车和货车，使其车队规模扩大近一倍，因为南非拥有一个多世纪历史的国有铁路垄断即将结束。【原文：Private South African freight-rail operator Traxtion will invest 3.4 billion rand ($199 million) in locomotives and wagons, almost doubling its fleet as the country’s more than century-old state rail monopoly comes to an end.】

item.title: 美联储在长期利率计划上罕见地出现如此大的分歧
item.description: 在降息超过一个百分点之后，美联储官员们现在正在思考该在哪里止步--他们发现分歧比以往任何时候都要大。【原文：After cutting interest rates by more than a percentage point, Federal Reserve officials are now wondering where to stop – and finding there’s more disagreement than ever.】

item.title: 菲律宾将增加全球债券供应，因为贪污腐败对经济造成冲击
item.description: 菲律宾计划明年将其国际债券销售额提高 60%以上，因为政府正努力为因贪污丑闻而受阻的经济提供资金。【原文：The Philippines is planning to raise its international bond sales by over 60% next year, as the government seeks to finance an economy stunted by a graft scandal.】

item.title: 彪马竞购话题为股价走向最糟糕一年带来些许安慰
item.description: 对于彪马 SE 的股东来说，2025 年是令人难忘的一年，最近有关可能被收购的报道只给他们带来了一丝希望。【原文：For shareholders of Puma SE, 2025 has been a year to forget, with recent reports of a possible takeover providing only the thinnest of silver linings.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称房贷援助或能遏制中国房市下滑
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）表示，中国可能会求助于抵押贷款补贴来重振房地产市场，估计中国政府可能需要每年支出约 4000 亿元人民币（570 亿美元）来提振受挫的消费者信心。【原文：China could turn to mortgage subsidies to revive its housing market, Morgan Stanley said, estimating that Beijing may need to spend about 400 billion yuan ($57 billion) a year to lift battered consumer confidence.】

item.title: 22V 称经济和人工智能的推动令做空美股变得危险
item.description: 任何想在本月押注美股的人，最好考虑一下美国经济的实力和围绕人工智能的持续热情。【原文：Anyone looking to bet against US stocks this month would be wise to consider the strength of the American economy and ongoing enthusiasm around artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 莫桑比克经济连续第四个季度萎缩
item.description: 莫桑比克经济连续第四个季度萎缩，原因是这个南部非洲国家的电力、天然气和供水行业产量下滑。【原文：Mozambique’s economy shrank for a fourth straight quarter as output in the southern African nation’s electricity, gas and water-distribution industry slumped.】

item.title: 大科技公司的 "少花钱，多赚钱 "模式受到人工智能的威胁
item.description: 二十年来，大科技公司的游戏规则相当简单，而且极其成功：创造颠覆性创新，实现惊人的增长速度，并控制支出。【原文：For two decades, the playbook for Big Tech was fairly simple and extremely successful: Create disruptive innovations, deliver blinding growth rates and keep a lid on spending.】

item.title: 据说华平投资的 ESR 正在考虑出售部分中国资产
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，ESR 集团有限公司正在考虑单独或作为一个投资组合出售其在中国的部分资产，以集中精力开拓其他市场。【原文：ESR Group Ltd. is considering selling some of its assets in China, either individually or as a portfolio, to concentrate on other markets, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 收购 Prosus 后，Just Eat 创始人辞去首席执行官职务
item.description: Just Eat Takeaway.com NV 创始人 Jitse Groen 将辞去食品配送公司首席执行官一职，由新东家 Prosus NV 的一名高管接任。【原文：Just Eat Takeaway.com NV founder Jitse Groen will step down as chief executive officer of the food-delivery company and will be succeeded by an executive at its new owner Prosus NV.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀走高，支持欧洲央行维持利率稳定
item.description: 欧元区通胀率上升，支持了欧洲中央银行的观点，即没有什么理由进一步降低借贷成本。【原文：Euro-area inflation inched up, supporting the European Central Bank’s view that there’s little reason to lower borrowing costs further.】

item.title: 经合组织称世界经济对关税表现出令人惊讶的韧性
item.description: 经济合作与发展组织（OECD）表示，由于人工智能领域的强劲投资以及财政和货币政策的支持推动了经济活动，全球经济对唐纳德-特朗普贸易关税的承受能力好于预期。【原文：The global economy is weathering Donald Trump’s trade tariffs better than expected as activity gets a boost from strong investment in artificial intelligence and supportive fiscal and monetary policies, the OECD said.】

item.title: 谢因鲍姆支持率下降，墨西哥政治风险达到秘鲁水平
item.description: 墨西哥的政治风险已上升到秘鲁的水平，因为墨西哥人对贩毒集团助长犯罪、腐败和经济停滞不前的不满情绪与日俱增。【原文：Mexico’s political risk has crept up to levels seen in Peru, as Mexicans voice mounting frustration over cartel-fueled crime, corruption and a stagnant economy.】

item.title: 经合组织预测英格兰银行将在 3.5% 时停止降息
item.description: 经济合作与发展组织（Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development）周二表示，在结束货币宽松政策之前，英国央行将在6月份之前再降息两次，将利率下调至3.5%，该组织同时上调了英国经济增长的评级。【原文：The Bank of England will cut interest rates twice more to 3.5% by June before monetary easing ends, the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development said Tuesday as it upgraded UK growth.】

item.title: 卢拉在大选民调中领先市场达林人弗赖塔斯的优势缩小
item.description: 一项新的民意调查显示，圣保罗州州长塔尔西西奥-德弗雷塔斯（Tarcisio de Freitas）在巴西2026年大选中可能成为总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）的挑战者，受到投资者的广泛青睐。【原文：Sao Paulo Governor Tarcisio de Freitas, widely favored by investors as a potential challenger to President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva in Brazil’s 2026 elections, has gained ground in hypothetical run-off scenarios against the leftist leader, a new poll showed.】

item.title: 南非起诉马士基和达飞轮船公司操纵价格
item.description: 南非反垄断机构将针对世界顶级航运公司（包括 A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S 和 CMA CGM SA）在当地分支机构的价格垄断投诉提交法庭起诉。【原文：South Africa’s antitrust body referred a price-fixing complaint against the local units of some of the world’s top shipping companies including A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S and CMA CGM SA to a tribunal for prosecution.】

item.title: 采矿业带动南非经济连续四个季度增长
item.description: 南非经济连续第四个季度增长，延续了自 2021 年以来最长的连续增长期，当时南非正从 19 世纪科维德大流行病中恢复。【原文：South Africa’s economy expanded for a fourth straight quarter, extending the longest growth streak since 2021 when the the nation was recovering from the Covid 19 pandemic.】

item.title: 前印度央行行长拉詹警告私人信贷风险上升
item.description: 印度储备银行前行长拉古拉姆-拉詹就全球私人信贷中流动性过剩的问题发出警告，他是最新一位就资产类别中不断上升的风险发表看法的人士。【原文：Former Reserve Bank of India Governor Raghuram Rajan warned about excess liquidity building up in private credit globally, the latest voice to weigh in on rising risks in the asset class.】

item.title: 澳洲央行鹰派押注出现，澳债跌势或将延续
item.description: 由于即将公布的经济数据可能会支持央行明年转为鹰派，澳大利亚主权债务的抛售还将继续。【原文：The selloff in Australia’s sovereign debt is set to extend with upcoming economic data likely to bolster the case for the central bank to turn hawkish next year.】

item.title: 摩根大通称欧洲银行将在 "完美 "条件下反弹
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：European lenders are operating in a “perfect environment” and will continue to rally, according to analysts at JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 英国央行警告债务推动的人工智能消费热潮可能瓦解
item.description: 英国央行警告说，由于股市估值 "严重过高"，由债务融资的人工智能基础设施领域数万亿美元的支出热潮有解体的风险。【原文：The Bank of England warned that a multi-trillion dollar spending boom in artificial intelligence infrastructure financed by debt risks unraveling given “materially stretched” stock market valuations.】

item.title: 英国央行警告对冲基金基础交易带来的金边债券风险与日俱增
item.description: 英格兰银行警告称，一种名为 "基差交易"（basis trade）的有利可图的固定收益对冲基金策略所带来的风险越来越大，呼吁市场参与者管理好自己的风险承担，避免出现可能引发金边债券波动的破坏性平仓交易。【原文：The Bank of England warned about growing risks from a profitable fixed-income hedge fund strategy known as the basis trade, calling on market participants to manage their risk taking to avoid a disruptive unwinding of trades that could prompt volatility in gilts.】

item.title: 沙特国家银行 10 亿美元贷款再添中东热潮
item.description: 沙特国家银行正在寻求一笔 10 亿美元的银团贷款，这将延续沙特王国贷款机构的借贷热潮，这些机构正在为 2 万亿美元的经济改革提供资金。【原文：Saudi National Bank is seeking a $1 billion syndicated loan, continuing a borrowing rush by the kingdom’s lenders that are helping finance a $2 trillion economic overhaul.】

item.title: BD 称南非金融改革可释放 2930 亿美元资金
item.description: 据《商业日报》援引一份为政府重要智囊团起草的研究报告称，如果南非对其金融体系进行彻底改革，就能吸引多达 5 万亿兰特（约合 2930 亿美元）的基础设施和清洁能源投资。【原文：South Africa could attract as much as 5 trillion rand ($293 billion) for infrastructure and clean-energy investments if it overhauls its financial system, Business Day reported, citing a study drafted for a key government think tank.】

item.title: 据说旅游平台 Klook 将推迟至 2026 年初在美国上市
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Klook 科技有限公司计划明年初在美国上市，因为这家在线旅游平台正在等待市场好转。【原文：Klook Technology Ltd. plans to list in the US early next year, according to people familiar with the matter, as the online travel platform waits for the market to turn more favorable.】
